name: Patagonia Line Logo Ridge Lightweight Crew Sweatshirt - Men's
categories: Line Logo Ridge Lightweight Crew Sweatshirt
description:
Extend the comfort of t-shirt weather with this warm crew neck.  Made of warm blend of organic cotton and polyester fleece, the Line Logo Ridge Crew dries faster than a cotton sweatshirt, lasts longer and is super comfy.Organic cotton blended with polyester fleece.Screen-print inks are PVC- and phthalate-free.Raglan sleeves offer a great range of motion and keep seams out from under pack straps.Patagonia original art.Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.Slim, athletic fit.
